queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tasks-log}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{audit-log}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nxrm-app}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown-nexusdata-owner-to-nexus-and-init-log-dir}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{request-log}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{request-log}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tasks-log}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{audit-log}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown-nexusdata-owner-to-nexus-and-init-log-dir}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nxrm-app}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nxrm-app}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nxrm-app}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{audit-log}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{chown-nexusdata-owner-to-nexus-and-init-log-dir}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{request-log}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{tasks-log}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{chown-nexusdata-owner-to-nexus-and-init-log-dir}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{chown-nexusdata-owner-to-nexus-and-init-log-dir}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nxrm-app}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nxrm-app}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tasks-log}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{tasks-log}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{request-log}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{request-log}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{audit-log}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{audit-log}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context
Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nxrm-ha}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=audit-log does not have a security context
spec.template.spec.containers.name=request-log does not have a security context
spec.template.spec.containers.name=tasks-log does not have a security context
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=chown-nexusdata-owner-to-nexus-and-init-log-dir does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.
Container should not use secrets as environment variables
Check if StatefulSet resources don't have a podAntiAffinity policy, which prevents multiple pods from being scheduled on the same node.
StatefulSets should be assigned with a PodDisruptionBudget to ensure high availability

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-nxrm-ha is targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-nxrm-ha is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
